note.p: Clergyman. Admitted sizar at Emmanuel College, 1821; BD, 1831. Vicar of Chipping Sodbury, Gloucestershire, 1822–57.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1956/144/17)
Gloucestershire, England, wills and inventories, 1541–1858 (Ancestry.com, accessed 6 October 2017)
Surrey, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1538–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 6 October 2017)
